author: Cleo Abram
description:
This is a ROBOT HAND!

It’s made for prosthetic arms that are connected to a person’s body with sensors that measure the electrical signals from their brain to their hand!

This is a big deal for prosthetics and I can show you some of what it can do... it's wild.

Oh, and also works for ROBOTS… and they’re testing it with brain implants.

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe.

#shorts #science #robot #prosthetic #tech
title: What Can This ROBOT HAND Do?
